languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, астропатический хор уловил ужасающие видения, посланные с Веабоса-6. Нечто пришло в колонию, и пришло оно из-под земли. Вскоре после того, как новый сектор глубинных штреков был введен в эксплуатацию, его наводнили чудовища. Они таятся во тьме, кишат в тенях, безмолвно атакуют и обращают в ничто все на своем пути — плоть, пласталь, скалобетон. Стрекот тысячи когтей возвещает об их приближении, и отчаянные крики звучат в безмолвии туннелей. Слава Золотому Трону, эти твари не стремятся выбраться на поверхность. Однако они захватили несколько действующих шахт и что-то творят там".

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, астропатический хор уловил ужасающие видения, посланные с Веабоса-6. Нечто пришло в колонию, и пришло оно из-под земли. Вскоре после того, как новый сектор глубинных штреков был введен в эксплуатацию, его наводнили чудовища. Они таятся во тьме, кишат в тенях, безмолвно атакуют и обращают в ничто все на своем пути — плоть, пласталь, скалобетон. Однако они захватили несколько действующих шахт и что-то творят там".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the astropathic choir have caught a glimpse of the horrifying visions coming from Vheabos-VI. Something had come to the colony — from underground. Soon after the new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it got overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly and dissolve everything in their path into nothingness — flesh, plasteel, rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to try and get up to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing something in there."

"Lord Captain, the astropathic choir have caught a glimpse of the horrifying visions coming from Vheabos-VI. Something had come to the colony — from underground. Soon after the new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it got overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly and dissolve everything in their path into nothingness — flesh, plasteel, rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to try and get up to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing something in there."

"Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."

languages.text: “舰长大人，星语唱诗班瞥见了来自维博斯六号星的可怕幻象。有什么东西从地下侵入了殖民地。某段新的深井隧道刚投入使用后不久，就被那群怪物占领了。它们潜伏在黑暗之中，在阴影中蠕行，悄无声息地发起攻击，不留任何痕迹。它们吞噬着血肉、塑钢和岩凝土，几千只利爪的尖鸣预示着他们的到来，寂静的隧道中回荡着受害者绝望的惨叫声。赞美黄金王座，这些怪物似乎无意前往地表。不过，它们已经占领了好几处正在开采的矿井，至于它们打算做什么，恐怕只有帝皇知道。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，星语唱诗班瞥见了来自维博斯六号星的可怕幻象。有什么东西从地下侵入了殖民地。某段新的深井隧道刚投入使用后不久，就被那群怪物占领了。它们潜伏在黑暗之中，在阴影中蠕行，悄无声息地发起攻击，不留任何痕迹。它们吞噬着血肉、塑钢和岩凝土，几千只利爪的尖鸣预示着他们的到来，寂静的隧道中回荡着受害者绝望的惨叫声。赞美黄金王座，这些怪物似乎无意前往地表。不过，它们已经占领了好几处正在开采的矿井，至于它们打算做什么，恐怕只有帝皇知道。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha vislumbrado horribles visiones procedentes de Vheabos VI. Algo ha penetrado en la colonia desde el subsuelo. Poco después de que se pusiera en funcionamiento un nuevo sector de túneles profundos, fue invadido por monstruos. Acechan en la oscuridad, se mueven en las sombras, atacan silenciosamente y no dejan nada a su paso, consumiendo carne, plastiacero y rococemento. El chirrido de mil garras anuncia su llegada, y en el silencio de los túneles se oyen gritos desesperados. Alabado sea el Trono Dorado, estas criaturas no parecen interesadas en llegar a la superficie. Sin embargo, se han apoderado de varias minas activas y están haciendo el Emperador sabe qué».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el Coro de Astrópatas ha vislumbrado horribles visiones procedentes de Vheabos VI. Algo ha penetrado en la colonia desde el subsuelo. Poco después de que se pusiera en funcionamiento un nuevo sector de túneles profundos, fue invadido por monstruos. Acechan en la oscuridad, se mueven en las sombras, atacan silenciosamente y no dejan nada a su paso, consumiendo carne, plastiacero y rococemento. El chirrido de mil garras anuncia su llegada, y en el silencio de los túneles se oyen gritos desesperados. Alabado sea el Trono Dorado, estas criaturas no parecen interesadas en llegar a la superficie. Sin embargo, se han apoderado de varias minas activas y están haciendo el Emperador sabe qué».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信聖歌隊がヴィアボス・VIからやって来る恐ろしいビジョンを垣間見たそうです。何かが...地下からコロニーに侵入しました。坑道の新しいセクターが稼動して間もなく、怪物に蹂躙されたのです。暗闇に潜み、影に群がり、音もなく襲い掛かり、肉、プラスチール、ロッククレートを食い尽くし、跡形もなく立ち去ります。奴らの千の爪が出す高音がその接近を告げ、坑道の静寂の中には絶望的な叫び声が響き渡るのです。黄金の玉座に讃えあれ、これらの生物は地表に出ることには興味がない様子です。しかし、奴らは使用可能な地雷をいくつも手に入れ、皇帝のみぞ知ることをやっているようです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信聖歌隊がヴィアボス・VIからやって来る恐ろしいビジョンを垣間見たそうです。何かが...地下からコロニーに侵入しました。坑道の新しいセクターが稼動して間もなく、怪物に蹂躙されたのです。暗闇に潜み、影に群がり、音もなく襲い掛かり、肉、プラスチール、ロッククレートを食い尽くし、跡形もなく立ち去ります。奴らの千の爪が出す高音がその接近を告げ、坑道の静寂の中には絶望的な叫び声が響き渡るのです。黄金の玉座に讃えあれ、これらの生物は地表に出ることには興味がない様子です。しかし、奴らは使用可能な地雷をいくつも手に入れ、皇帝のみぞ知ることをやっているようです」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, le chœur astropathique a eu des visions atroces provenant de Vhéabos-VI. Quelque chose s'en prend à la colonie... quelque chose qui vient des profondeurs. Juste après la mise en service d'un nouveau secteur de galeries profondes, le site a été envahi de monstres rôdant dans l'obscurité, se glissant dans les ombres et attaquant sans faire de bruit... Ils ne laissent aucune trace dans leur sillage, dévorent les chairs, le plastacier et le rocbéton indifféremment. Le crissement de milliers de pinces annonce leur approche et l'on entend alors des hurlements de désespoir déchirer le silence des tunnels... Grâce au Trône, ces créatures ne semblent pas vouloir parvenir jusqu'à la surface, mais elles se sont emparées de plusieurs mines actives et allez savoir de quoi d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, le chœur astropathique a eu des visions atroces provenant de Vhéabos VI. Quelque chose s'en prend à la colonie... quelque chose qui vient des profondeurs. Juste après la mise en service d'un nouveau secteur de galeries profondes, le site a été envahi de monstres rôdant dans l'obscurité, se glissant dans les ombres et attaquant sans faire de bruit... Ils ne laissent aucune trace dans leur sillage, dévorent les chairs, le plastacier et le rocbéton indifféremment. Le crissement de milliers de pinces annonce leur approche et l'on entend alors des hurlements de désespoir déchirer le silence des tunnels... Grâce au Trône, ces créatures ne semblent pas vouloir parvenir jusqu'à la surface, mais elles se sont emparées de plusieurs mines actives et allez savoir de quoi d'autre. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der astropathische Chor hat von Vheabos-VI kleine Fetzen grauenhafter Visionen empfangen. Irgendetwas ist in die Kolonie eingedrungen — von unter der Erde. Kurz nach Eröffnung eines neuen tiefen Tunnelabschnitts wurde die Kolonie von Monstern überrannt. Sie lauern in den Dunkelheit, schwärmen in den Schatten, attackieren leise und lassen nichts zurück. Sie verschlingen Fleisch, Plaststahl und Felsbeton. Das Klackern von eintausend Klauen kündigt ihr Kommen an, und verzweifelte Schreie zerreißen die Stille der Tunnel. Thron sei Dank scheinen diese Kreaturen kein Interesse daran zu haben, an die Oberfläche zu gelangen. Aber sie haben mehrere aktive Minen erobert und tun dort Imperator weiß was."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropathic Choir have caught glimpses of horrifying visions coming from Vheabos VI. Something has breached the colony — from underground. Soon after a new sector of deep tunnels had been put into operation, it was overrun by monsters. They lurk in the darkness, swarm in the shadows, attack quietly, and leave nothing in their wake, consuming flesh, plasteel, and rockcrete. The chirring of a thousand claws heralds their approach, and desperate cries can be heard in the silence of the tunnels. Praise be to the Golden Throne, these creatures do not seem to be interested in getting to the surface. However, they have seized several active mines and are doing Emperor only knows what."
